On Sat, 23 Oct 2004, Kathy Van Stone <kvs@...> wrote:

> Generally when the XML is empty I found that is was because there
> was an exception creating the test suite. It may also happen if the
> setup in a TestSetup case fails, but I am less certain of that.

And it can happen if a timeout occurs (supposed to be fixed in Ant
1.6.2) or the test invokes System.exit.

All of this cases are supposed to be fixed in Ant's CVS.

So if it fails for all tests that are subclasses of MytestSetup it's
rather likely that Ant failed to extract the tests properly.  Running
the tests inside Ant's VM (i.e. fork="false") should at least give you
a stack trace even in "older" versions of Ant.

Stefan
